ai-tika-vin09t19:109_2: that is to say, the desireless, the passionless, and the taking up of,
ai-tika-vin09t19:109_3: Hence it is said: “But what is Māra?”
ai-tika-vin09t19:109_5: The Commentaries called “It is said” and “the Collection of the Vinaya”.
ai-tika-vin09t19:109_6: That is why the method of explanation should be understood in the way already described.
ai-tika-vin09t19:110_0: This is there anything more than this:
ai-tika-vin09t19:111_0: The settling of legal issues is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t19:112_0: So the doubt of the Monastic Code has come up in the gold.
ai-tika-vin09t19:113_0: on the contrary, on the Monastic Law, in the Teacher’s Discipline,
ai-tika-vin09t19:114_0: The commentary on the monk’s expression is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t19:115_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
